To get a handle on working with tibbles (i.e. data frames) in R, here are some other resources to check out:

- [RStudio Primers on Working with Data:](https://rstudio.cloud/learn/primers/2)
  - [Working with Tibbles](https://rstudio.cloud/learn/primers/2.1)
  - [Isolating Data with dplyr](https://rstudio.cloud/learn/primers/2.2)
  - [Derive Information with dplyr](https://rstudio.cloud/learn/primers/2.3)
- [R Data Frames](https://www.datamentor.io/r-programming/data-frame/), by datamentor.io
